Package it.polimi.ingsw.view

Interface Ui

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Cli, Gui
    public interface Ui
    This interface joins methods for User Interface regardless of chosen technology.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean isViewInitializationDone()
      Gets if the view initialization is done.
      int manageCommandChoice​(java.util.List<CommandMessage> commands, boolean undo)
      Manages multiple options coming from server during game.
      void refreshView​(MatchView mw)
      Refreshes view after a MatchView instance update.
      void refreshView​(PlayerView pw)
      Refreshes view after a PlayerView instance update.
      void refreshView​(SquareView sw)
      Refreshes view after a SquareView instance update.
      void run()
      Starts the application managing the ui
      void setViewInitializationDone​(ModelView modelView)
      Notify that the view initialization is done updating the instance of ModelView, then calls a refresh of entire view.
      void setViewInitializationUndone()
      Sets that view initialization is not already done, which means that view-side model is not ready.
      void showLeaderBoard​(java.util.Map<PlayerId,​java.lang.Long> leaderBoard)
      Shows leader board at the end of game.
      java.lang.String showMessage​(java.lang.String toBeShown, java.util.List<java.lang.String> possibleAnswers, boolean isAnswerRequired)
      Shows a message coming from server.

    • Method Detail

      • showMessage

        java.lang.String showMessage​(java.lang.String toBeShown,
                             java.util.List<java.lang.String> possibleAnswers,
                             boolean isAnswerRequired)
        Shows a message coming from server.
        Parameters:
        toBeShown - is a string represent a question or a statement
        possibleAnswers - is the list of the possible answers that user can choose
        isAnswerRequired - specify if an answer is required (the message is a question) or is not (the message is a notice)
        Returns:
        the user's answer or a reception acknowledgement

      • manageCommandChoice

        int manageCommandChoice​(java.util.List<CommandMessage> commands,
                        boolean undo)
        Manages multiple options coming from server during game.
        Parameters:
        commands - is the list of command user can choose from
        undo - specify if user can come back to the last choice
        Returns:
        the number correspond to the user choice

      • setViewInitializationUndone

        void setViewInitializationUndone()
        Sets that view initialization is not already done, which means that view-side model is not ready.

      • isViewInitializationDone

        boolean isViewInitializationDone()
        Gets if the view initialization is done.
        Returns:
        true if the view initialization is done

      • setViewInitializationDone

        void setViewInitializationDone​(ModelView modelView)
        Notify that the view initialization is done updating the instance of ModelView, then calls a refresh of entire view.
        Parameters:
        modelView - is the ModelView instance to be updated

      • showLeaderBoard

        void showLeaderBoard​(java.util.Map<PlayerId,​java.lang.Long> leaderBoard)
        Shows leader board at the end of game.
        Parameters:
        leaderBoard - is the leader board sent by server

      • run

        void run()
        Starts the application managing the ui

      • refreshView

        void refreshView​(PlayerView pw)
        Refreshes view after a PlayerView instance update.
        Parameters:
        pw - is the PlayerView instance to be updated then shown

      • refreshView

        void refreshView​(SquareView sw)
        Refreshes view after a SquareView instance update.
        Parameters:
        sw - is the SquareView instance to be updated then shown

      • refreshView

        void refreshView​(MatchView mw)
        Refreshes view after a MatchView instance update.
        Parameters:
        mw - is the MatchView instance to be updated then shown
